As the countdown to Toyoda's retirement is underway, the manga has been reprinted for the first time in 23 years!\n\nSince his debut in 1982, he has depicted the \"fighting spirit\" and \"will to move forward\" in various forms, including \" Blazing Transfer Student\" \" Adversity 9\" \" Burning Pen\" and \"Howling Pen\". The manga is based on his own adolescence.\n\nMost of the main characters in his \"burning\" works are male, but there is one female protagonist who shines brilliantly among them.\n\nThat is Manami Toyoda. Manami Toyoda was a real-life female professional wrestler who created an era in the 1990s under the nickname \"Flying Tennyo.\nThe title of the work is literally \"Burning! Women's Pro Wrestling.\n\nThis documentary manga depicts a black-haired girl gritting her teeth and growing by her own will in the ring, the square jungle, the wonderland of battle. It was serialized from the August 1992 extra issue of Weekly Shonen Sunday to the December 1993 extra issue, and is the gold standard of authentic women's pro wrestling manga!\n\nThis spring, Manami Toyoda announced that the 30th anniversary of her debut, which will be held on November 3, 2017 at the Osanbashi Hall in Yokohama, will be her last active match!\n\nThe event was met with an outcry on the Internet from women's professional wrestling fans of the past, and among them was mangaka Kazuhiko Shimamoto! c120f9ae-afa5-44f8-b54b-efdeea87c1be:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"c120f9ae-afa5-44f8-b54b-efdeea87c1be","title":{"en":"Sham Cat"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"シャン・キャット"},{"ja-ro":"Shan Cat"}],"lastChapter":"5","description":{"en":"Short manga serial of Hideo Azuma that features the first Neko-Mimi (cat-ears) in history, Sham Cat. (further details in the rest of the desc.)\n\nSerialized in Weekly Shonen Champion.\n\nDescriptions for each chapter:\n\n- Chapter 1 - **Sham Appears**\nAn odd cat who can speak human language comes running into\nthe apartment of a ronin student boy. The cat also turns into a bishojo!\n\n- Chapter 2 - **Cutting a Tail, and a Great Transformation...!?**\nBan (The last name of this ronin student) goes to his part-time job, but Sham, wanting attention, follows him around after.\n\n- Chapter 3 - **Dig Up Shadows, Nyan Nyan!!**\nAll living things have a great weakness. You'll know right away when you dig up their shadow...\nSham displays her mysterious ESP, and an enemy bearing an existential crisis draws near.\n\n- Chapter 4 - **When You Want to be Popular, This Scent...**\nBan falls in love with Ranko, the idol of Ajima Prep. He tearfully wishes,\n\"I want to be popular for once!!\" Sham easily succeeds in granting this.\n\n- Chapter 5 - **A Reassuring Ally Appears!!**\nTomorrow is the entrance exams at last, yet Ban isn't doing well and becomes frantic.\nHe is able to fall asleep from Sham's ESP, but Sham's fleas start to rampage...\n\nSham Cat was collected into Azuma's **Absurdity Diary** (不条理日記, Fujouri Nikki), a compilation of short SF one-shots and serials which were parodies of popular SF works and it was released the same year. Absurdity Diary won the 10th Seiun Award for Best Comic also within the same year.\n\nAzuma mentions that Sham Cat is intended to be a parody of Shambleau by female American SF author C. L. Moore (part of the Northwest Smith series of short stories). But in addition to this, one could also observe two key influences in Sham Cat.\n\nSham Cat, both the character and the manga, is Azuma's composite of two series, [Urusei Yatsura](https://mangadex.org/title/6b9206b3-5c0f-4cf8-a0cc-d2c9e1aa4df9/urusei-yatsura), and its female lead, Lum, and [The Star of Cottonland](https://mangadex.org/title/6bc9f38a-9a36-4a3f-9a70-4d465e9d597f/the-star-of-cottonland) with its lead, Chibi-Neko, both of which were being serialized around this time, and Azuma himself professed to very fond of Urusei Yatsura from its very first chapter (source: QuickJapan, issue 71). \n\nThe compositions, tone, flow, plots, and characterization of Sham Cat parallels Lum and the early chapters of Urusei Yatsura, with additional elements being from Chibi-Neko.\n\nHideo Azuma's lasting influence with Sham Cat can still be seen to this day. What frequently, and erroneously, is referred to as the 'Anime Cat Girl' are all modern day Sham Cats. One could humorously say that we have many different breeds of Sham Cats today."},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"2d1f5d56-a1e5-4d0d-a961-2193588b08ec","name":{"en":"Loli"}},{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"aafb99c1-7f60-43fa-b75f-fc9502ce29c7","name":{"en":"Harem"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"dd1f77c5-dea9-4e2b-97ae-224af09caf99","name":{"en":"Monster Girls"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}}]}

Dans le but de le laisser divorcer, elle s'adonne au pire des comportement, mais d'un autre côté, Orpheus n'est pas prêt à la laisser partir…?  \r\n\r\n\r\n---\r\n\r\n[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6420cd/)"},"links":{"al":"110959","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/dp/B08X6XJVK2?binding=kindle_edition\u0026ref=dbs_dp_rwt_sb_pc_tukn","bw":"series/242502/","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/584354/A002356931/","kt":"57204","mal":"124045","mu":"154738","nu":"a-rose-dedicated-to-you","raw":"https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_FL00200953010000_68/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"d14322ac-4d6f-4e9b-afd9-629d5f4d8a41","name":{"en":"Villainess"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

c1543fcc-1b07-4057-ace4-194885729205:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"c1543fcc-1b07-4057-ace4-194885729205","title":{"en":"The Turning Point Of Shura- Birth Of Malice"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"수라전기 : 악의 탄생"},{"ko":"수라전기-악의탄생"},{"en":"The Turning Point of Sura - Birth of the Malice"},{"ru":"Сура Электрик: Рождение зла"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["id","en"],"description":{"en":"In the Early Era, the Creator gave man a mission to eliminate all the ‘unclean’ entities that existed in the world. The man confessed to the Creator that he couldn’t complete the mission on his own and asked for help. In response, the Creator sent 13 people, including ‘Ragnir’ to help. They were called ‘The First Shura’ and they would work to fulfill the Creator’s mission together. That is until a huge war breaks out between the ancient creatures and the Shura, whom they fear. Thus begins the ‘Discord’ and the ‘Birth of Malice’.\n\n---\n\n- [Original Webtoon \u003ckakao\u003e](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58879666)","id":"Pada Era Awal, Sang Pencipta memberi manusia misi untuk melenyapkan semua entitas ‘najis’ yang ada di dunia. Pria itu mengaku kepada Sang Pencipta bahwa dia tidak dapat menyelesaikan misinya sendiri dan meminta bantuan. Sebagai tanggapan, Sang Pencipta mengirim 13 orang, termasuk ‘Ragnir’ untuk membantu. Mereka disebut ‘Syura Pertama’ dan mereka akan bekerja untuk memenuhi misi Sang Pencipta bersama-sama. Itu sampai perang besar pecah antara makhluk kuno dan Syura, yang mereka takuti. Maka dimulailah ‘Discord’ dan ‘Birth of Malice’.\n\n---\n\n- [Original Webtoon \u003ckakao\u003e](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58879666)","ko":"태초의 시대, 창조주로부터 세계에 존재하는 ‘부정한 것’을 없애라는 사명을 받은 ‘이름 없는 자’. 그는 혼자 힘으로는 사명을 완수할 수 없음을 고백하고 창조주에게 동료를 만들어 줄 것을 간청한다. 이에 창조주는 ‘라그니르’를 포함한 13명의 존재를 내려 보낸다. 이름 없는 자는 자신과 동족들을 수라라 명명하고 함께 창조주의 사명을 완수하고자 한다.\n그리고 시간이 흘러 수라와 수라의 행보에 반발심과 공포를 지녔던 고대 생명체들 사이에서 거대한 전쟁이 벌어진다. ‘대격돌’이다.\n\n---\n\n- [Original Webtoon \u003ckakao\u003e](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58879666)"},"links":{"mu":"196925","raw":"https://bufftoon.plaync.com/series/1007607"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

c15b4cc8-92a5-4ac9-b2a6-389ebaad366b:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"c15b4cc8-92a5-4ac9-b2a6-389ebaad366b","title":{"en":"The Princess in the Attic"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"다락방 황녀님"},{"ko-ro":"Daragbang Hwangnyeonim"},{"en":"Attic Princess"},{"en":"The Princess of the Attic"},{"fr":"La princesse du grenier"},{"es":"La princesa del atico"},{"ru":"Принцесса с чердака"},{"th":"องค์หญิงห้องใต้หลังคา"},{"ja":"屋根裏部屋の皇女様"},{"zh":"阁楼里的公主"},{"zh-hk":"閣樓裡的皇女"},{"zh-hk":"閣樓公主"},{"zh-hk":"閣樓裡的公主"},{"zh-hk":"閣樓間皇女"},{"id":"Putri loteng"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"I've lived in this little hell ever since I was born for being the daughter of a gypsy who carries misfortune. The Trump Empire killed my innocent mother. The emperor, the temple, and the whole empire locked me up, abused me, resented me, and abandon me. Their abandonment is an opportunity, Here in the kingdom of Jardine, I will begin my revenge. The Trump Empire, may it dry up a little more. The dryness will soon be a precious stream for me. …I will start my revenge.\n\n---\nBranded as a cursed child, Princess Osiria spent most of her life locked in an attic. In actuality, Osiria is the divinely chosen, the one who could’ve saved the empire of Trionfo. Instead, she was sold to a neighboring kingdom and left in the care of Sir Fedelius, a handsome young knight. Although her heart beats faster when Fedelius is around, she doesn’t plan on staying for long. She wants only one thing… to get revenge on those who abused her and killed her mother. Will her heart soften with love or will she seek vengeance to the very end?\n\n---\n[Original Web Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/50688024)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%A4%EB%9D%BD%EB%B0%A9-%ED%99%A9%EB%85%80%EB%8B%98/2968), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59133025)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-princess-in-the-attic/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26272\u0026contentId=272)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%96%A3%E6%A8%93%E8%A3%A1%E7%9A%84%E7%9A%87%E5%A5%B3/323)\n* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/1132)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Princess-in-the-Attic/566)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/107770)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%84%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%8D%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B2/372)","fr":"Pendant 20 longues années, l'Empire a connu une immense sécheresse. Pour la punir, elle a donc été enfermée dans un grenier et a été traitée pire qu'un chien pendant 20 ans. Mikuri longs to start a career in her field, and her Aunt Yuri, who has had success in her professional life and who regrets never marrying, also wants Mikuri to find love.  \n  \nWhen Mikuri learns that her parents are planning to move to the country, she realizes her time is running out. She still has had no luck starting her career, so it seems she will have no option but to move to the country with her parents. She finds another option in moving in with Tsuzaki, who doesn't want to lose his housekeeper. To deal with the scandal of their living together, they get married–though just on paper. Por un tiempo todo marcha bien hasta que los padres de Mikuri deciden mudarse al campo. Ella no quiere mudarse y perder la oportunidad de especializarse en su carrera. Él no quiere perder a su confiable ama de llaves. Juntos, empleada y empleador encuentran una solución y es irse a vivir juntos. Para hacerle frente al escándalo de vivir juntos, ambos deciden casarse - aunque sólo por papel. Tudo estava indo bem, até ela descobrir que seus pais decidiram se mudar para o interior. Então, nossa mocinha não tem outra opção a não ser mudar com seus pais, certo? Errado! At last, the coronation ceremony I stood by him expecting to become Empress. However, the crown of empress didn’t become mine, it became Vienna’s my younger cousin. I threw everything away to make Rakan the emperor, and all that’s left for me ahead was death. It wasn’t until I was abandoned that I realized he used me. Everything was a ruse. The carefully planned screenplay its main characters being the love of my life Rakan and my cousin, Vienna. I was the only one who didn’t know that. In my last moments I made a promise. If I had another chance, I wouldn’t love you again even if I died. I’ve miraculously returned to the past! To when I was 18, the day all the disharmony began. I made up my mind in tears. This time, I’m going to give everything I’ve got to destroy you Rakan. In my vow of revenge, I began to see something I had never noticed before. My fiancé Paylon, has always looked my way. “Please be on my side. I don’t need love.” I’m not going to let you hang on to me this time!\n\n---\nKaira willingly risked her life to make her beloved Prince Reagan emperor. But when the man she sacrificed it all for crowns her cousin as empress instead of her, she loses the will to live. It’s only when she’s finally succumbed to a lethal dose of poison that she’s met with the tears of a heartbroken Prince Faylon, and she realizes her love was wasted on the wrong person. Vowing to exact revenge if ever given the chance, Kaira is thrust back in time to right the wrongs committed against her and reclaim the title that is rightfully hers. As she joins hands with Prince Faylon and sets out to punish those who conspired against her, she’ll discover a world she once took for granted and seek to correct the course of her
